full_output.summary: I'm a nal year B.Tech Computer Science Engineering student with a strong passion for technology leadership. As a full-stack developer, I specialize in backend development, ensuring robust server-side functionality and seamless user experiences in various web applications. My expertise also extends to deep learning, where I've worked with state-of-the-art transformers in NLP and CV applications. With my familiarity in Data Structures and Algorithms, I e�ectively tackle complex problem-solving tasks. Committed to staying at the forefront of technological advancements, I aspire to lead innovative tech projects, contributing my skills and knowledge to drive progress in the tech industry.
